title: What Internet Browser do you use?

replies.body:
Notice: If you don't use a Chromium Based browser, just type in the OTHER Tab of Question 2 anything you want.

Sorry for that.
replies.body_tagged:
Notice: If you don't use a Chromium Based browser, just type in the OTHER Tab of Question 2 anything you want.

Sorry for that.

replies.body: What if we use more than one?
replies.body_tagged: What if we use more than one?

replies.body:
The results are in!

1st:
Chromium Based
  • 21 - Google Chrome
  • 16 - Google Chrome (64-bit)
  • 1 - Google Chrome Canary (I use Chrome Canary)
  • 1 - Tor Browser
  • TOTAL - 39
2nd:
Firefox (Gecko Based)
  • 10 - Mozilla Firefox
  • 1 - Deep Web Firefox
  • 1 - Developer Firefox
  • TOTAL - 12
3rd
Opera
  • 4 - Standard Opera
  • TOTAL - 4
4th
Internet Explorer
  • 3 - Latest IE (presumed)
  • 1 - Internet Explorer 9
  • TOTAL - 4
5th
Safari
  • 1 - Standard Safari
  • TOTAL - 1
6th
Other
  • 1 - Vivaldi
  • 1 - Ultrasurf
  • 1 - Maxathon
  • TOTAL - 3

63 VOTES TOTAL
